originalText.text: Campbell Industrial Heating & Air Conditioning did a great job installing our new electric split system and removing the old gas one. They were very helpful and told us everything we needed to know to operate the system and what to look out for. And our sales person gave us a competitive price for our split system purchase and install. We were very impressed.

text.text: Campbell Industrial Heating & Air Conditioning did a great job installing our new electric split system and removing the old gas one. They were very helpful and told us everything we needed to know to operate the system and what to look out for. And our sales person gave us a competitive price for our split system purchase and install. We were very impressed.

originalText.text: We had a leak in the water heater at our house and thought it would need to be replaced. Stanley arrived and immediately discovered the expansion tank was putting too much weight on the cold water supply line. That little bit of weight was causing a small leak into the tank. Stanley supported the expansion tank and tightened the supply line. Problem fixed and we did not need to buy a new water heater. Excellent service from Campbell Industrial Heating & Air Conditioning.

originalText.text: Campbell Industrial Heating & Air Conditioning crew installed my new air conditioning and furnace units. They were here on time early in the morning, were careful to cover my floors and clean up everything,  wore their masks the whole time, and even stopped to answer all of my questions - and still finished in one day.  My house is now ready for any weather conditions.

originalText.text: Campbell Industrial Heating & Air Conditioning technicians are very thorough, skilled and professional. They worked with me through some scheduling issues and were responsive to my needs. They were very friendly and helpful.They explained to  me how my system works and how to take good care of it. I would definitely recommend them.

originalText.text: Today we had Dan, as our tech. He was very informative and helpful. Did a clean efficient job. Polite and neat. These are some of the reasons we use Campbell Industrial Heating & Air Conditioning for AC and Heating concerns. They are thorough and competitive with pricing as well.
